Participants complete questionnaire lifestyle factor usual diet measure waist hip . Saliva buccal specimen collect future research . PROJECTED ACCRUAL : - A total 30 case 30 control accrue study .
DOC.criteria: DISEASE CHARACTERISTICS : Cases Diagnosed endometrial cancer within past year Selfidentified black , AfricanAmerican , black Hispanic , African , AfroCaribbean Healthy control Selfidentified black , AfricanAmerican , black Hispanic , African , AfroCaribbean No history endometrial cancer ( except nonmelanoma skin cancer ) No prior hysterectomy PATIENT CHARACTERISTICS : Speak English No medical condition would make difficult complete interview PRIOR CONCURRENT THERAPY : See Disease Characteristics
